import React, { useEffect, useState, useRef } from 'react'; import '../styles/login.css'; import ProfilePic from '../styles/MyImage.jpeg'; const MainPage = () => { const [typedName, setTypedName] = useState(''); const fullName = " I AM MUHAMMAD MEHDI CHANGEZI"; const hasTyped = useRef(false); useEffect(() => { let index = 0; const typingInterval = setInterval(() => { if (index < fullName.length) { // Ensure we are within bounds setTypedName((prev) => prev + fullName.charAt(index)); // Append the next character index++; } else { clearInterval(typingInterval); // Clear the interval when done } }, 100); // Adjust typing speed by changing this value (milliseconds) return () => clearInterval(typingInterval); // Cleanup interval on component unmount }, []); // Empty dependency array to run on component mount return ( <>

{typedName}

About Me

Hello! My name is Mehdi, and I am currently pursuing a degree in Computer Science at the prestigious Lahore University of Management Sciences (LUMS).

With a strong passion for technology, I have developed a keen interest in website and mobile app development.

I possess a diverse skill set, particularly in the MERN stack and Flutter, which I have utilized to create innovative software solutions.

As I embark on my professional journey, I am eager to enhance my skills and make a meaningful impact in the tech industry.

I look forward to exploring exciting opportunities that will further propel my career.
